description: This is an xDDL specification for the xDDL specification. The idea here is that the specification should become self-validating

types.name: coreTypes
types.description: This is the enumeration of core type values

allowable.description: A character sequence value, assumed to be short (less than 255 characters)
A character sequence value that is long and generally free text.
A Gregorian calendar date with no time zone information. ISO-9601
A time of day with no time zone information.
A Zulu timestamp in ISO-9601 date time format.
An integer value of unlimited size
A floating point value of unlimited size, and arbitrary precision

structures.name: BaseType
structures.description: A structure representing the base of a @type values

types.description: A list of type definitions. These should generally be simple, basic types for use as 'References' in the 'structures' array.
